course_description: This course is designed to provide students with the research skills necessary to undertake critical interdisciplinary studies in Islamic Civilizations.   The class will also include Program in Scholarly Integrity sessions on mentoring and the ethics of research, writing, and publication.
sections: Class Nbr: 1326, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 2:30-5:15p, Instructor: S. Kugle, Status: Open
